quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.

quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg
quotes.quote: Option A is not available. So letâ€™s kick the sh*t out of Option B.

quotes.author: Stephen Covey
quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.author: Will Smith
quotes.quote: The first step is you have to say that you can.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

quotes.author: Kobe Bryant
quotes.quote: Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses.
